event.name: OrderRequested
event.summary: Holds information about the customers order.

producers.name: Basket Service
producers.summary: CRUD based API to handle Basket interactions for users of the shopping website.

publishes.name: AddedItemToCart
publishes.summary: Holds information about what the user added to their shopping cart.

publishes.name: OrderRequested
publishes.summary: Holds information about the customers order.

publishes.name: RemovedItemFromCart
publishes.summary: Holds information about what the user removed from their cart.

publishes.name: PaymentProcessed
publishes.summary: Holds information about the payment that has been processed.

publishes.summary: Inform about a new user registration in the system

subscribes.name: OrderRequested
subscribes.summary: Holds information about the customers order.

markdown.content:
<Admonition>When firing this event make sure you set the `correlation-id` in the headers. Our schemas have standard metadata make sure you read and follow it.</Admonition>

### Details

This event is triggered when the user confirms their order and wants to process their payment.

We have a frontend application that allows users to buy things from our store. The frontend application interacts with the Backet Service to trigger the `OrderRequested` event.

<NodeGraph title="Consumer / Producer Diagram" />

<Schema />
